title: Spacious, comfortable 650 Sq Ft 1 bed, 1 bath! Now showing!
posting_body: ['Welcome to Tara Bridge Apartments!', '1 Magnolia Circle Jonesboro, GA 30236', 'Rental Size:', '1 BR - 1 BA - 650 sq ft |', 'Per Month:', 'Please call |', 'Lease Length:', '6-Month, 7-Month, 8-Month, 9-Month, 10-Month, 11-Month, 12-Month', 'show contact info', 'Tara Bridge Apartments boasts Amenities that make living here both comfortable and convenient.', 'Work out in our fitness center, relax by the pool or enjoy a game of tennis on the tennis court.', 'A spacious sunning deck perfect for grilling or picnicking is available.', 'You can also enjoy a leisurely walk around the community as it is nestled amongst canopies of trees and other natural surroundings.', 'This home features uniquely angled walls in every room and an open, airy design.', 'Our community Staff', '✓ Picnic Areas with BBQ Grills', 'Our unit features:', '✓ Carpet', '✓ Ceiling Fans', '✓ Dining Room', '✓ Dishwasher', '✓ Disposal', '✓ Oven', '✓ Range', '✓ Refrigerator/Freezer', '✓
